Higher Education with Kaplan International

Time to travel. Time to learn. Time to live Now’s the Time

Contact an advisor

Study English this Summer

Don’t let this summer slip away – Make it count Take the time to pursue your dreams and explore your potential with a Kaplan English Course

Intensive English Contact an Advisor

  • Get the most learning time out of your vacation and immerse yourself in the English language
  • Customize your learning experience by choosing the length and intensity of your course
  • Take extra lessons on business English, Academic English or test preparation
Contact an Advisor For more information

English For Business Contact an Advisor

  • Focus on improving English for your career. Build your experience in the classroom or in a work placement
  • Gain confidence for interviews, running meetings and presenting in English
  • Enhance your résumé with practical business communication and writing skills
Contact an Advisor For more information

TOEFL® IBT And Academic English Contact an Advisor

  • Start preparing for your TOEFL iBT over your vacation
  • Take the most efficient route to achieving your qualification
  • Focus on exam content and test-taking strategies to maximise your chances to get the score you need
Contact an Advisor For more information

Create your own package

How do you want to spend your time? Choose your perfect destination, course and accommodation

Your Destination

What’s your ideal study location?

The heart of the city – or a sun-drenched beach? London’s Covent Garden – or the top of the Empire State Building? Choose the perfect place from our amazing range of destinations

Your English Course

How do you really want to study?

Whether you want to boost your skills dramatically in a short space of time, pass a specific exam, or simply pick up the basics whilst having some fun, Kaplan can cater to your individual needs.

Your Accommodation

What feels like home for you?

Feeling at home is crucial to your learning experience. Whether you prefer to live with other students or with a native family, all of our student homes are safe, social, well-maintained and located close to both schools and city centres.

Send your enquiry To create your own package

Time to travel somewhere new

Explore one of our spectacular destinations this summer

  • Discover the US, the UK, Canada, Ireland, Australia or New Zealand and explore somewhere new
  • We have schools in the center of metropolitan cities, by the side of idyllic beaches and on the campuses of respected universities.
  • Discover iconic locations like London and New York, or choose somewhere less world famous and have a more unique and personal experience – we have a destination for everyone
Contact an Advisor For more information
